section.name: Velocity Engine
section.p: This is the release page for the Velocity templating engine. This subproject contains also the task definitions for using Velocity from Apache Ant.
If you are getting started with Velocity, this is probably the right place to begin.

Released versions of the Velocity engine:
Velocity 1.3.1
Velocity 1.4
Velocity 1.5
The latest development documentation is available from the development tree.
